item.title: Drones blasting AC/DC, Scarlett Johannson help biologists protect cattle from wolves
item.description: Biologists are using drones to scare wolves away from cattle

item.title: Republican Sen. Joni Ernst won't seek reelection next year, source says
item.description: Iowa Republican Sen. Joni Ernst plans to announce that she will not run for reelection in 2026, a senior Republican official familiar with her decisio...

item.title: Legendary sheriff implicated in wife's murder almost 60 years later
item.description: New evidence suggests that legendary Tennessee Sheriff Buford Pusser of "Walking Tall" fame killed his wife, police said.

item.title: WATCH: Trump cuts nearly $5B of foreign aid
item.description: President Donald Trump told Congress that he will slash $4.9 billion of congressionally-approved USAID and State Department foreign aid funding.
